alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 28 at 5:48PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Ventura County. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated moderate to heavy rain. Rainfall rates of 0.25 to 0.75 inches per hour are expected with these showers. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oxnard, Thousand Oaks, Simi Valley, Ventura, Camarillo, Fillmore, Ojai, Moorpark, Santa Paula, Port Hueneme, Newbury Park, Point Mugu, Westlake Village, and Oak Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
